2012570.name: ZOSU VR Explosive Bow Hunting
2012570.description:
Vast and beautiful HD forests await you in this virtual reality game! Hunt animals (fallen aliens in disguise) with exploding arrows (cartoonish destruction) in a variety of levels covering over 3 square miles (7 square kilometers) with many animals and foliage.

Have you ever wanted to climb trees in VR while making your way through forests while hunting? Then this is the game for you!

Playable on:
- oculus touch devices (oculusquest linked, metaquest2 /oculusquest2 linked, metaquestpro linked, oculus rift, oculusrifts),
- valve index,
- hp reverb g2 with valve index controllers,
- pico4 PCVR

Each level varies in both size and content. Explore levels with a variety of different features per level, some including: climbable trees, climbable castles / urban cities / villages, oceans, snow, dynamic weather, day/night cycles, dense scenic forests and climbable forests, and more!

Most of the animals (aliens) are fairly stationary as to try to be more camouflaged, as such this game / experience is largely about exploring and finding animals in a casual virtual environment.
